title: ModernShop E-commerce
description: A complete e-commerce platform redesign focusing on user experience and conversion optimization. Features include intuitive navigation, advanced filtering, and seamless checkout process.

title: Analytics Pro Dashboard
description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for SaaS companies. Clean data visualization, real-time updates, and intuitive user interface for complex data sets.

title: FitTracker Mobile App
description: A fitness tracking mobile app with personalized workouts, progress tracking, and social features. Focus on motivation and user engagement through gamification.

title: GreenTech Brand Identity
description: Complete brand identity design for a sustainable technology startup. Logo design, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines for consistent application.

title: Bella Vista Restaurant
description: Elegant restaurant website featuring online reservations, menu showcase, and event booking. Photography-focused design that highlights the culinary experience.

title: Creative Portfolio Site
description: Personal portfolio website for a creative director. Minimal design approach with focus on showcasing work through interactive galleries and smooth animations.
